item.title: Urgent, 11th November
item.description:
A neighbor has left their garden waist in the street and now there is a van coming with construction waste and dropping multiple delivery of rubbish on the top of, this is obstructing the street and also offering danger to the kids that live in the road, can this please be cleaned urgently. I have made a complaint a few weeks ago and it is only getting worse

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albert Way, Peckham, London

item.title: The profusion of leaves is attracting load of rubbish being thrown with the leaves, 11th November
item.description:
We're very rarely get any cleaning in our street. The leaves are piling and passes by are just throwing their litter into it or cars parked all day long with leaves and their own rubbish being thrown with the leaves this is totally unacceptable from the Council. We have informed you of this problem in this half of our road and you've done nothing about it week after a week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Durham Avenue, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sheldon Road by junction of Anson Road, 11th November

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Anson Road, London
